includedAssets.title: The Dark Swan
includedAssets.synopsis: The residents of Storybrooke do everything they can to find Emma, who meets a mysterious redhead as she faces up to the darkness inside her.

includedAssets.synopsis: The Storybrooke residents attempt to keep their identities secret from Arthur and Camelot in order to gain their trust, find Merlin and save Emma.

includedAssets.title: Season 5
includedAssets.synopsis: The residents of Storybrooke face off against two legendary fantasy characters as Emma tries to destroy the darkness now inside her. Fifth season of the hit fantasy drama starring Jennifer Morrison and Ginnifer Goodwin.

includedIn.title: Once Upon A Time
includedIn.synopsis: After her long-lost son suddenly reappears, Emma Swan is taken to Storybrooke, a mysterious town whose residents bear a striking resemblance to fairy-tale characters. There she must find her parents, defeat a wicked queen and break a dark curse.
